name: UXFolio Case Study Template (Beta)
description:
Draft, organize, and experiment with your case study layouts more fluidly in Figma before publishing final work on UXFolio.


Drafting with this template provides the following functionality currently not available directly in UXFolio:

  • Quickly zoom out to see your whole case study doc
  • See layout changes as you rearrange sections
  • Apply different layouts to sections without having to recreate the content
  • Jot down ideas for image and media content in placeholder boxes
  • Track draft vs final sections
  • Quickly undo/redo changes to section order and customization options


The template uses Auto Layout to accurately recreate UXFolioâ€™s layouts and Variants to recreate its customization options so you can rapidly experiment with your document structure without worrying about feasibility on the actual site.
